meanings.sent1: I audiotaped my friend singing at the party.
meanings.sent2: She audiotaped the lecture to listen to it later.
meanings.sent3: The cat audiotaped the bird chirping and played it back to annoy the bird.
meanings.sent4: His words were audiotaped in my mind, replaying over and over.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the waves audiotaped a calming melody in my ears.

meanings.definition: Past tense and past participle of audiotape.
meanings.sent1: I found an audiotaped interview from last year.
meanings.sent2: The audiotaped conversation revealed important details.
meanings.sent3: The audiotaped music brought back memories of a fun road trip.
meanings.sent4: The audiotaped message was a reminder of her voice.
meanings.sent5: The audiotaped story was like a time capsule of the past.
